ModMetaData.name: Better Notifications
ModMetaData.author: krafs
ModMetaData.description: Slightly improved notifications - Put alerts to sleep by right-clicking - Auto-close letters Mod Compatibility - Save game safe. - Currently incompatible with Toggles. Instructions Add Better Notifications anywhere in your load order. If you're experiencing issues or missing features, try putting it further towards the end. - Right-click an alert on screen to hide it. Set the timer in the mod settings. - Set letters of specific categories to auto-close. Set the categories and timer in the mod settings. Usage Use however you wish. Source is on GitHub[github.com]. Drop me a message if you do. Suggestions and questions are welcome! Post in a Discussions thread or send me an e-mail at massa@krafs.net. Want to translate the mod? Send me a pull request on GitHub[github.com] or an e-mail. License MIT
